channel.title: logging on 程序猫大刚

item.title: java日志门面
item.description: 1.slf4j是什么 slf4j全称为Simple Logging Facade for Java ,即java简单日志门面，渐渐地替换调了apache common logging。 The Simple Logging Facade for Java (SLF4J) serves as a simple facade or abstraction for various logging frameworks (e.g. java.util.logging, logback, log4j) allowing the end user to plug in the desired logging framework at deployment time. 理
